name: Attach Font Awesome
author: Afshin Talebi

sections.description: This plugin add font awesome library to the front of wordpress site and you can put font awesome css classes anywhere in your contents. After the plugin installed , in the settings > Attach Font Awesome Options you can set load library files from Local or CDN.
sections.installation: Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page.
